Saturday and Sunday, February 7 & 8, 2026
Opening Night Friday, February 6, 2026
Meet the Artists

Whether you’re a serious art lover or a casual collector, ArtFest Fort Myers is the perfect place to connect in the art world.
Meet the Artists in person
As a juried art festival, we are choosy about the artists who come to ArtFest Fort Myers. Only 1 in 5 artists who apply are invited to exhibit here, and they hail from dozens of states across the U.S.
ArtFest is an artist’s and art lover’s destination — right here in Fort Myers.
Visit the Online Art Gallery and browse some quality work at this year’s ArtFest. And make plans to chat with our artists, up close and in person, as you discover beautiful, handcrafted pieces in every booth.
Add to a favorite collection, or begin with your first art purchase. You’ll find a treasure to call your own, regardless of your age and budget.
What does it mean
to be a Juried Art Festival?
Artists apply by submitting digital images of their artwork and booth display.
A five-member panel of art professionals reviews and scores all entries. ArtFest staff members are not involved in the selection process — it is done exclusively by the panel.
The artists whose entries score highest in each category are invited to exhibit at ArtFest Fort Myers.
Artists are selected based on the quality of workmanship, originality, and artistic conception, to create a balanced and diverse show. All work must be created solely by the exhibiting artists.
Juried art festivals work hard to maintain each event's quality and professional integrity. Exhibitors considered "importers" and "production houses" are not allowed to exhibit
Explore ArtFest Artists
Enjoy the work of hundreds of ArtFest artists from the past decade-plus, starting with the 2012 festival!
Go to the ArtFest Online Gallery
Many Thanks to ArtFest Supporting Sponsors
Suncoast Credit Union
We’re Designed to Help You Save. Presenting Sponsor of Art Under 20.

ArtFest Fort Myers Leadership
At the heart of ArtFest Fort Myers is a passionate, creative, and dedicated team that believes in the power of art to bring people together. From event planning and artist support to community outreach and volunteer coordination, our staff works year-round to ensure that every detail of the festival reflects our mission of inclusion, inspiration, and impact. We're more than event professionals- we are advocates for the arts, champions of creativity and proud members of the community we serve.
Executive Director
Juan Santiago
Juan Santiago leads ArtFest Fort Myers with a passion for community, creativity, and connection. Juan champions the power of the arts to inspire, unite, and transform. His vision is rooted in honoring tradition while creating bold new opportunities for artists and audiences alike.
Director of Community Engagement
Grisel Martin
Grisel brings vibrant energy and a heart for community to her role at ArtFest. She is dedicated to building strong relationships with artists, volunteers, and cultural organizations, helping expand ArtFest’s reach and deepen its impact across Southwest Florida.
Production Manager
Monica Garcia
Monica ensures every detail of the ArtFest experience comes together seamlessly. With a background in event production and operations, her organizational excellence and creative problem-solving make her an essential force behind the scenes.
About
ArtFest Fort Myers
Mission
To enrich communities through the transformative power of the arts — by providing a diverse and inclusive platform that amplifies artists, fosters arts education, engages art enthusiasts, and catalyzes economic prosperity.
Vision
The vision of ArtFest Fort Myers is to nurture the community through art educational experiences and an arts-driven economy.
About
ArtFest Fort Myers, Inc. is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit arts and cultural corporation best known for its annual juried fine art festival, which nurtures our entire community's artistic and cultural environment.
On the first weekend in February, 90,000+ people come to the riverfront in downtown Fort Myers and enjoy the extraordinary opportunities the festival provides:
Meeting visual artists from across the country and worldwide, sampling fun cuisine, visiting special exhibits and artist demonstrations, and entertaining their families with interactive art activities and performing arts.
ArtFest Fort Myers also supports arts in education through art education and outreach programs.
As a not-for-profit organization, ArtFest Fort Myers relies on support from grants, sponsorships, artist and food vendor entry fees, beverage sales, and festival T-shirt and poster sales to fund the art festival and outreach programs.
We are also committed to the best practices in the art festival business. We belong to International Festival Events Association, Florida Festival Events Association, and our local Chamber and Alliance for the Arts. The annual Festival Events Association Conventions, behind-the-scene trips to events, frequent calls with festival directors, and local training keep us up-to-date with best practices and innovative ideas.
ArtFest Supports the Community
ArtFest Fort Myers is committed to supporting the community that supports us.
As one of our community's most popular, well-known, and respected arts organizations, we are ever-aware of our responsibility to be involved in the success of art and culture throughout the area. We are members, attendees, and supporters of all the arts organizations in Lee County.
Board of Directors
Sharon McAllister

Saturday and Sunday, February 7 & 8, 2026

Artists like you come first at ArtFest Fort Myers!
[if lt IE 9]><script>document.createElement('video');</script><![endif]
http://artfestfortmyers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/2023-The-Artist-Experience-Video.mp4
We support artists and facilitate meaningful connections between artists and collectors. A two-day event with optional Opening Night on Friday attracts 90,000 attendees, including a loyal base of dedicated art buyers and VIP Club members focused on discovering and acquiring your artwork.
Celebrating 25 years in 2025, ArtFest Fort Myers is a free, non-gated art festival featuring 200 artists in a picturesque setting overlooking the Downtown Fort Myers riverfront. New and cutting-edge art is equally at home with more traditional work.
You'll find a strong market here: Fort Myers is the #1 fastest-growing of the 150 major cities in
US News 2024's report on growth areas.
This coastal city is home to a vibrant downtown and enjoys close proximity to the beautiful sandy beaches of Sanibel Island and Fort Myers Beach.
The Fort Myers median age of 45 and strong new homes sales combined with the art loving attendees from neighboring cities of Naples & Sarasota created ArtFest Fort Myers as a prime destination for art enthusiasts and new homeowners seeking to enhance their living spaces.
At this artist-friendly festival, we do everything we can to make your busy weekend as stress-free and rewarding as possible.
Year-round professional staff with 25+ years of consistent management.
Booths with 3ft between them.
A convenient Friday setup with drive-up access.
Reserved nearby artist parking including overnight RVs.
Indoor bathrooms.
Daily complimentary continental breakfast, coffee and water.
Booth sitters and dedicated Artist Ambassadors.
Professional overnight and daytime security.
Discounted hotel rates.
Commitment to accessibility, offering physical accommodations for artists with disabilities to ensure equal opportunities for participation.
Support for artists who are new to selling at outdoor art festivals.
Contact us
for assistance.
To make your experience at ArtFest Fort Myers even more rewarding, we promote the festival extensively and provide artists with promotional opportunities. We also offer valuable resources, webinars, and tips to help you navigate the evolving art market.
We are passionate about supporting your success.
Reach out
with any questions - we value open communication with artists like you.
Forbes Magazine rated
Fort Myers/Cape Coral as
#1 in population growth
#10 in job growth
with construction activity
topping the charts!
